title: Jamie's minestrone
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 onions, chopped', '4 stalks celery, chopped', '5 carrots, sliced', '500ml (17 fl oz) chicken stock', '500ml (17 fl oz) water', '2 (600g) jars passata', '100ml (4 fl oz) red wine', '1 (400g) tin kidney beans, drained', '250g (9 oz) green beans, trimmed', '75g (3 oz) spinach, rinsed', '3 courgettes, quartered and sliced', 'small handful chopped fresh oregano', 'good handful chopped fresh basil', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '75g (3 oz) stellette soup pasta', '2 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese to serve', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil (optional)']
